tr.th: TB Intensified case finding in adults

td.p: Examine the patient and do sputum examination if coughing(sputum smear or gene Xpert)
Initiate workup for Isoniazed Preventive Therapy and repeat screening on subsequent visits.

obs.answerLabels: Retard tabs:20 mg,LA tabs: 30 mg,LA tabs: 60 mg
